I am a firm believer in vinegar, but have not really used ACV much. However, I am going to start. This book was well written. And makes a lot of sense.
This kind of story is always uplifting to me.  Enjoyed it very much.

One thing I love about reading sci-fi novel is the fact that I can explore my imagination to the maximum level. Experiment by Cyma is one of the examples of a good reading that has full imagination. I am so amazed knowing someone can write stuff like this. Brilliant imagination! All I can say that Experiment is a "dangerous" book. By dangerous, I mean you have to be prepared to pending your daily activities because once you start reading it, a small chance you will put it down the book before you reach the last page. Nicely done to the author!

I really enjoy a high octane Sci-Fi Dystopian story that causes me to bite my nails to the quick. "Experiment" had all of the suspense, fear-factor, and a very explosive ending that satisfied me as a reader.Cyma Rizwaan Khan has a way of building a world that will have you feeling like you are on a journey with the Volze brothers. Human Citizens on the alien planet of Zyron are enslaved by the Khaltars. Resistance has meant certain death for many Citizens and any Zyronian sympathizers in the past. Many have given up and live on the dregs of society.Thirty year old Connor has done all of the dirty husslin' to take care of his younger brother Lane. He wants his brother to have a chance at a better life. Life takes a turn for Lane one night and he is falsely arrested for the murder of a Zyron and sentenced to death. Many Citizens have been imprisoned under false accusations by Khaltar officials, and their families or lack there of have done nothing, but not Connor. He will do anything to save his brother from the torture that the "Black Wall" is notorious for. Before Connor can get to Lane, experiments and torture are unleashed on him on a daily basis. Lane is not the same young man upon his escape. He is a walking time bomb!Did I say EXPLOSIVE ending?!! Yeah I was in shock, I didn't see that coming. What am I talking about? I recommend you read it. Great read! :)
I Liked it it was good hope there's more to come .......If reading this try this book you might like it to.

I absolutely love the "Shopping for a Billionaire" series. The characters are great and it keeps you laughing and engaged in the story all throughout. My only complaint is having to wait for series number 4!!! It can't come soon enough.. ;).Totally worth reading...so enjoyable. Hoping series 4 is on its way soon.

As always, Julia Kent has knocked it out of the park, done a crazy chicken dance in the end zone, and any other sports metaphors you can come up with. The only problem I have with this is that it's short and left in a cliffhanger. But hey, I knew what I was getting into. So, if she could maybe, I don't know, hurry up and release the next installment, that would be great. No rush or anything, just maybe a little hurry?

This box set is a great deal if you are looking to get helpful advice on the benefits of cleansing your liver. With the information in these books, you can do a liver detox or liver cleanse flush that removes toxins from your body. There are multiple benefits if you do this and the first book shows you exactly how to get started. The second book focuses on the idea of weight loss in combination with liver detox, because optimizing your liver health will help you lose weight! What I liked most besides the detailed informations were the sample meal plans to get you going.
Sexy two guys!  Manly writing, which I love!

Keith Mackler’s book about his own weight loss is definitely a different kind of weight loss book. You can’t even call it a diet book because it is the antithesis of your typical diet plan. Yet, the way in which Mackler accomplished his weight loss was very effective, as seen in the many photos throughout his book. I especially liked that Mackler addresses his emotional healing along with his physical transformation. While your typical fad diet skims the surface of the connection between emotional well-being and physical health, Mackler delved deeply into his emotional baggage and revealed to readers how healing his emotional wounds was paramount to curing hid addiction to food. If you have tried every fad diet out there with nothing to show for it, read Keith Mackler’s story and it may supply the inspiration and motivation that you are looking for.
summary: Different Kind of Weight Loss Story

reviewText: This is not your ordinary diet book. Keith Mackler, did not use any of the ‘regular’ diet plans that most of us are familiar with. His plan: “was to not have a plan.” He used what he calls mindful eating. He states that one must have a healthy relationship with food.He does agree with a ‘regular’ diet on a few points. A couple of them are exercise and a support group. Keith does agree that you can go it alone if necessary but that it is much easier if you have a support system of family and/or friends around you. “Support is a necessary element during the weight loss but even more during the maintenance phase.”Keith writes, “Alas, I find myself agreeing with most scientists, that you must burn more calories than you eat in order to lose weight and maintain weight loss. So no matter how much you or I want me to write that you don’t need to exercise to lose weight, I can’t do it. You need to move to lose.” Keith tells us how he accomplishes this. “I decided to adopt what I call a super active lifestyle. Essentially this means that I now embrace and live a lifestyle that pushes me physically and work my total body on a daily basis.” The required 10,000 steps are easily accomplished as he walks everywhere in his “gym” NYC. At home he simply does sit-ups and push-ups every day.Keith was using food as a ‘drug of choice.’ He writes, “Food is my addiction and in order to stay healthy and happy I need to avoid my triggers.” He gives many helpful hints and guidelines that one can apply to their own lives if one choses to adopt this excellent form of transformation. “I want to show everyone that you have all the tools within yourself on any given day to succeed in changing your life.” You can if you think you can, if you think you can’t then you are also right!
summary: No plan - just desire and determination

reviewText: This latest entry in the Seattle Lumberjacks series is a great summer read. I loved the two lead characters and seeing what is happening with past characters.

This book was great. The twist were unexpected making this a brilliantly written book.  All I can say is read it for yourself. You won't be disappointed. I will definitely read more of Mr. Smith's books.

I had a fantastic experience while reading this book as it was very much attractive one for me. I already read the first book of this and I was in eager to read the second one soon. Similar to the first book, this one is also a pretty interesting one with lot of things to learn as adults. It’s a great mix of life lessons and at the same time, it was an excellent reading too. I believe that this book will would have attracted many young people by now. Love it and highly recommend.

This a well written gluten free slow cooker recipe book which is easy to understand and easy to prepare. The author shows how Cooking healthy gluten-free meals does not need to be difficult and time-consuming. The ingredient shown in this book can easily be found from most local supermarkets

I have been waiting for this book for a little over a month now. To say I am disappointed is an understatement. First of all, there was nothing leading up to their affair. They just immediately went from acquaintances to bed buddies. Second, only 80% of the book is on Sherlyn and Thomas. The other 20% is an excerpt from a book of hers I have previously bought. Third, the ending is not typical of a "happily ever after" and is open-ended. The only reason I can it 3 stars is because usually I am not disappointed with Ms Lee's books. Otherwise I would have given it a -1 rating if I could. If this is your first time reading her books, then do not let this work discourage you. This book needs a to-do in the worst way.

If you've followed the history of these two, you'll understand my rating.  This was a good story and it followed exactly to the title.  I had to read it twice to make sure it ended the way it did, but it was worth it.  I loved this story and I recommend it.  I love her stories also.Enjoy reading.  K
summary: This was a good story and it followed exactly to the title

reviewText: This book really shows a journey for a woman who starts out appalled by a man ordering her dinner for her, to eventually being collared by that same man! It is a great length, long enough to tell the whole story. And their are lots of baby steps involved!! Lots of attention to detail, lots of different scenes, and very erotic. BDSM isn't even my favorite genre, but this was so well written that I loved it!

Very intense book about the steps a successful woman is led through as she discovers the intense emotional bond formed between her and her new Master.  Natalie is shocked to discover that allowing James total control makes her experience intensity in service to him at a level that astounds her.  She looks to her friend Jo-Anne for confirmation that she isn’t nuts only to discover that Jo-Anne not only knows that James is a Dom, she is a Domme as well.  Learning at both their hands and comparing notes with Jo-Anne’s own slave, Marc, and her submissive, Claire, leads Natalie to decide that she wants nothing more than to give herself into slavery to her Master.  This book is very intense and has a great deal of BDSM and spanking scenes.  It isn’t for the faint of heart but if you are looking for a well written book that dares to disclose the exchange of power in a D/S relationship, then this is a book you shouldn’t miss.
summary: Not a simple love story but one of intensity

reviewText: Excellent!  I read this in one after noon and was little upset with Jess!  Good series and glad I have read this series

I have now read all four books and I am left feeling more confused than ever. I kept hoping that one would redeem the other. The book is about sex between Jessica and Nathan and even after the fourth book we know nothing of consequence about them yet there's going to be a fifth book.I'm disappointed and it all feels so disjointed.

Nathan is so in love!! He just can't help it he wants to be with her and even imagines getting married and starting a family with her. The author is amazing they way she wrote this story with all the twists and turns of the story line you just never knew which way she was gonna go with scenes and then BAM! Cassandra's boyfriend is Nathan, Drew is the father of her twins... It just keeps going and going, I bought the first book in order to see if I was gonna like it and later that day I bought the rest of the series because I was that hooked and had to know what was going to happen in the end. Definitely recommend you read this series, you will not regret it.

Basic info on beans, some recipes sound interesting and will try. Would have liked photos showing different beans to help identify some I have not heard of but have probably seen in the store under different common names.
summary: will try but would have liked visuals

reviewText: I really liked this cookbook. It gives all the information you need to cook beans and legumes perfectly.  The instructions to make the recipes are concise and easy to follow. I made the pinto bean and chickpea salad and both were absolutely delicious. Will definetively try some more recipes from this book. I love it and my family loves it too. Great and very well written. I would recommend.Thanks for sharing. Great job!

Beans are legumes are very high in proteins and other nutrients. They are very healthy and tasty. This book does a good job at explaining what legumes are and classify then by types or by color as many classify them. The recipe part is very good also. You get the ingredients list and preparation method step by step, so if you are not very experienced at the kitchen, you can still manage to prepare one or two of them. Because of that, and the quantity of recipes and the structure of them, I highly recommend this book if you want to prepare some legumes dishes.

I freakin love Robin Alexander...I've yet to read one of her stories and found myself being bored! I seem to fall in love with every stories characters and find myself wishing i knew them all. Thanks for another great book Robin!!

You just have to love Robin Alexander's books. She knows how to approach love's angst with a sense of humor. The secondary characters are always well developed and lend so much to the story. Alex and Dana were inseparable best friend until Alex went off to college and after time they lost touch. Alex has loved Dana since they were children but Dana is straight or is she. Alex's Maw Maw is the typical dying grandmother with no brain to mouth filter (we blame our mother for this trait in our family, I think is genetic) and full of laughs. Ms. Alexander must know my family because she always includes these type of older women that remind me soooo much of the elders that have passed. A great book to sit and enjoy a laugh and love story with. Keep them coming.
summary: If you enjoy a romance with humor Ms. Alexander's book are for you.

reviewText: Robin Alexander never disappoints me when I read one of her novels. They are always well written and entertaining.  The touch of humor in this novel given to us by Thelma (Maw Maw) was delightful.  I found myself laughing and even giggling out loud. Do yourself a favor and get one or all of Ms Alexander's novels.

This is another book about the Wheat Belly diet yet recommends the use of flours that Dr. Davis says to stay away from. The author acknowledges that some flours need to be used in sparing amounts but fails to list tapioca flour as one of those to be avoided. Tapioca flour is one of the worst offenders if you are trying to be rid of inflammation and watchful of carbohydrates.
summary: Beware of recommended as offering flours

reviewText: I'm an exercise instructor and personal trainer, so I was quite interested in reading this book. Of course I knew the material contained within these pages, but as I read through I realized how packed, well organized and useful this short book is. The newcomer to an exercise program could use this quite short book as a step by step intro to exercises and body types, exercise management, and motivational tool, for success.For the rest of us, it's full of great reminders.My favorite is "avoid the scale" as your thinner, fitter body may not show up on the scale. I once had a client come to me and say that after six weeks she hadn't lost a pound. I told her to go home and try on her "skinny jeans" that were too small. She returned the next week--the skinny jeans were now too big!
summary: Excellent for newbies, good reminders for us regulars!

reviewText: When  one of my hero's the late Jack Lalanne, the father of fitness, was told "You get up early every morning, seven days a week and work out for one and a half hours you must love exercise." He replied "Are you kidding? I Hate Exercise... but I L-O-V-E what it does for me." He was physically amazing and still exercised until his passing at 96 years old. Exercise is for everyone! It doesn't matter if you are overweight, underweight or just right exercise will make your life better.The problem with exercise is it take work and most of us want to get out of work. At last, author Bryson has the answer. This book is packed with ideas and strategies to help you stay focused on your goal. You learn how to keep your motivation past the first couple of weeks. Find out the exercise routine that is for you. You will understand why the food you eat today is the body you will have tomorrow.They are many exercise books but they do not focus on the need to stay loyal to your exercise routine. This book is the missing link to fitness success. I recommenced this book for everyone.Now I am going to brush the thick dust off my exercise machine and put in a little time.

Some of these crowdfunding projects are a little bit crazy, and I can't believe they were funded! This was a really fun anthology of projects that are not for the weak of heart. One story, in fact, will make you a little nauseous. The authors wrote such varied stories, all in the same format, which made it easy to read a little bit at a time. I really enjoyed this anthology by John Joseph Adams.
summary: A fun collection of crowdfunding projects

reviewText: Home is Where the Heart is‚ is an easy an enjoyable read.Author did a good job in developing the plot and characters. Good but not great. The story has a light intensity‚ but not enough of it‚ and I was left hanging and bit disappointed.It was a good read and I did enjoy it‚  but it simply wasn't for me. If you enjoy reading light hearted story‚ you should give it a try.≧◔◡◔≦ 3.5 ✰ read ≧◉◡◉≦
summary: If you enjoy reading light hearted story‚ you should give it a try.

reviewText: I thoroughly enjoyed this book. I tend to be one of those readers who enjoys reading stories about writers, and I loved the angle on this story. The heroine, a former best-selling children's author, felt genuine and real, and her struggles were so interesting to me. The hero was dreamy and their relationship became complicated quickly, which I appreciate. The writing was strong and the ending satisfying. I'm going to go back and read the other two books in the series. I do love small town romance, and this was such an endearing story.
summary: Not Read the Other Books in the Series, but Really Enjoyed This Book

reviewText: This book is informative and reveals a lot of tips as an alternative for inhaler as answer for asthma. As quoted, " a healthy lifestyle and good health is worth a million bucks". A valuable resource.

If you have always wanted to read a Jeff Strand book but thought, "Man his books are just way too gory and gross," then this is the book for you. A very endearing story with typical Jeff Strand humor. (And when I say that I mean freakin' hilarious.) Even if you haven't read Jeff Strand before you should read this. No I mean it. Stop what you are doing now and get this book. Ok, good. You won't regret it.

Angelbound:Myla is so bad ass that I kind of want to be her. Who know being a half-demon living in Purgatory could be so freaking cool? Not only that, but Lincoln is hawt! Myla made me literally LOL throughout the book. She's strong, funny, and can kick some serious ass. When s*** goes down, she doesn't just sit by and let it happen. Nope. She fights with everything she has to save the day. The world Christina builds is original and rich. And the cast of characters are just so much damned fun that I missed them as soon as I was done reading!Can't wait to read the other books! Don't miss it!

This Review is of Becoming Alpha ONLY!!______________________I loved, loved, loved this book! I stayed up until the wee hours of the night reading this! It was that good. It's not perfect, but it sure was entertaining and I am crazy for book 2 at the moment.Tessa was a very forgiving (it become annoying how forgiving she was by the second half of the book), would-die-for-a-normal-life girl. The problem is she has to wear gloves/cover her skin at all times because every time someone touches her she has visions/reads emotions and it really takes a toll. That's probably why she tries so hard to fit in with a clique that has nothing to do with her interests and due to peer pressure decides to drink a shot of tequila at a party (P.S. She had never drunk alcohol before this).Dastien was the hero. Tessa's and his relationship was also insta-love and just for that the book became your typical love triangle werewolf story."The spark was Fourth of July-sized with Dastien."It was a turn-off, but the story (apart from that) was pretty creative and well written so I continued on. Dastien is the all around nice guy with an ahhhmazing body and has an actual brain that functions. What I hated about him when he was introduced was that he ignored her and glued himself to Queen Bitch (Imogene - Even her name sounds Queeny to me -shudders-). Sure, we later found out it was at her parents request to give her "space", but all it did was add unnecessary drama to a very good action story.I will admit that I was Team Chris in the beginning. Especially since I imagined him as Liam Hemsworth....Dreamy -sigh-."Chris was nice and funny and easy to be around and also hot."He was there for her in the beginning unlike Mr. Insta-love.Meredith is the BFF I will always want to have. She's caring, understanding and is always on your side. No. Matter. What. & Best of all she wasn't plotting to take Dastien away from Tessa, unlike Shannon.The ending was nice. Sure, a little predictable and finished WAY too fast, but nice. If it were any other author she would have stopped the book with the kidnapping and leave everyone hanging. You know what? I respect Mrs. Erin because she didn't do that. She knows there are a lot of subplots to be resolved in the story still and she can always integrate another big bang at the end of book two. So it's a win-win.Favorite Quotes:"Yes. I want you to continue talking so I can finish eavesdropping.""It was like I walked into a living Abercrombie Ad." (My thoughts: Why isn't my college like this? URGH...Real life sucks....=/)"Do you believe in love at first sight? Or should I tackle you again?"
summary: Becoming Alpha: I loved, loved, loved this book!

reviewText: I really enjoyed reading the book emotional eating because it helped me to get my mind set in line with my food habits. I have struggled for years with my diet and after reading this book I feel like a brand new person.Thank you so much for the helpful information given within this book it really made a positive difference in my life!
summary: Emotional Eating Was A Terrific Book!

reviewText: When I started this series I was at first I got aggravated at the cost for the small installments but I couldn't stop oh I am so glad I didn't. I loved this book would have loved an epilogue even more but may be summer will write.more and.show me their happy ever not your traditional after. The tenderness at the end  I know they will be together forever such a irregularities worth it!

I really enjoyed reading this book.  I really learned a few things.  I didn't realize that there were petitions within the Lords Prayer.  This book explains them as well as many other things.  Very good read, everyone should read this book.

Get this book if you love shifter books. This is an amazing book. I did not read the first book to this story but this book can be read as a stand alone as there is only a little bit of intersection with the first book. There is plenty of action in this book and the developing love between Lars and Tamara is really nice and well written. The story moves along at a good pace with out being slow or feeling rushed. The characters have well rounded personalities and fit well together it doesn't feel forced. The fact that Lars is a spy and hot as well really makes visualization really easy. If you are a fan of Shifter/Paranormal romance I strongly recommend this book you will not regret it.
summary: Get this book if you love shifter books

reviewText: I have always wanted to learn to crochet. I remember watching my grandmother crochet when I was little and the wonderful things she would make. So I was very excited to find a book that makes learning how to crochet so easy.  This book takes you step by step through all the things you need to get started crocheting.  From choosing yarn to joining squares this book has you covered.

So I recently purchased a juicer and had no idea what to do with it, lol. So I was talking with friends and they suggested I try The Juicer Recipes Book. I was skeptical because I wasn’t sure If I was going to like the recipes when I saw what the book had to offer, but surprisingly I like quite a few of the recipes. The way the book is set up I can find a juice recipe for whatever my situation is. For example, I don’t have the best skin, there is a section of recipes just for skin issues, and my fav was the Peach –Strawberry Nectar and was exactly as good as it sounds.

The book is simple, clear and straight to the point. It can be understood by anybody, giving creative ideas of the different ideas for natural vitamin water. Be sure to try it as I have learnt to make the Vitamin water using peaches.

I was provided with a free copy of the book in exchange for an honest review by the author.This book was much more than I thought it would be.  The journey Kane goes through losing his best friend and business partner.  He has to work out his unresolved emotions while at the same time having building emotions for his best friend's brother.  Nex essentially lost his brother when he was 10 due to their mother's murder.  Kane needs him to help test something that Kane and his brother had developed.  Their relationship has a gradual build up which is nice.
summary: The journey Kane goes through losing his best friend and business partner

reviewText: Storm has written a marvelous novel of adventure and courage. Jasyra must face her own fears and limitations and possibly the destruction of her kingdom as well. How far will Jasyra go to save the people and home she loves? And what will be the final cost? From the beginning the book was filled with danger, mystery, humor. My daughter and I, loved the surprising twists, and good, spooky fun. A must read fantasy series
Not a long book,but everything you need to lose weight quickly.There is very little fluff in this book,just hard and fast guidelines.A must if you want to lose a few pounds for your summer holiday.

The city of Waldron’s Gate is idyllic. Clean and proper. Everything makes sense. But Eila Doyle senses something’s off.A visit to a psychic kicks off Eila’s journey to discover the truth lying beneath Waldron’s Gate. And as the truth is revealed, Eila faces a foggy distinction between dreams and reality. She learns that her beliefs about addiction and insanity might be upside down.Whether you’re looking for a fun story that keeps you turning the pages or you want to dig a little deeper into theme and great characters, the Dream Engine is worth the time.
Set in a fast paced interview style, "Destiny Defining Decisions" is a quick and easy read chock full of idea nuggets from people who have made a difference.
summary: Lots of Ideas. Just Add Action.

reviewText: This book is MARVEL-ous! It's a collection of transcripts from live interviews with people who have become highly successful in their chosen endeavors while overcoming great obstacles. Jam packed with knowledge and wisdom, it's an uplifting and inspiring book that will shorten the learning curve for any project a person is dealing with. Our destiny truly is defined by the little choices we make day to day and by how we cope with the adversities that inevitably happen. I highly recommend this book.

I’ve studied the ultra-successful class of business people a great deal in the last few years so anything that comes along in that genre is fair game to me. This book delves into the tactics and strategies of 11 expert entrepreneurs and ultimately outlines 7 key skills used by them all to create exceptional wealth and income.For me, the 2 chapters focusing on forming superior negotiation skills and establishing personal, social and public accountability practices were of great value and worth the price of the book. These 2 skill sets directly translate into the type of business I am running and, therefore, are very applicable and transferable. As a budding entrepreneur myself, I can relate to much of the content in this well written book and directly apply it to my journey of creating a lasting and sustainable business that thrives and provides me with financial freedom and location independence.The business people in this book may be folks you have never heard of in some cases, but their successes and methods cannot be dismissed given the results they have achieved. The interview format taken by the author provides a unique look into the lives and workings of these great business minds. As such, I am positive you will enjoy this book if you value entrepreneurship and learning all you can about it and making your business run better to achieve the success you desire.
summary: Great read for learning strategies of the ultra-successful

reviewText: The whole book was a breeze to go through because it was just so interesting. This book gives a lot of new perspectives on the typical stereotypes in our generation, covering the subjects of teens, parents, and even the elderly. I was actually surprised by the statistic that teenagers are the LEAST sexually active in the past 25 years. The author claims that the media portrays things completely different from what they really are, which adds on to stereotypes. A lot of more interesting points are covered in this book, I would highly recommend  it if you want a fun and interesting read.

A 5 star ratingI'm so happy I requested this book. The first one I really didn't like Harper I just couldn't get over it. This book made me love her like I loved Deacon. This book made me fall for him all over again he's so perfect. So it was wonderful for me to really enjoy this book so much. Also now I'm even more excited about the next book in the series great job ladies.Received a complimentary copy from NetGalley for an honest review.

After reading the enchanting fantasy tale of The Necklace of Goddess Athena, I marked this author as one whose books I won’t miss. The fact that this second attempt of Effrosyni Moschoudi cleared the second round of the Amazon Breakthrough Novel Award contest is a further testament to the writer’s talent.Emancipated Laura finds love and her star shines brightly in Brighton in the ‘30s. Insecure Sophia finds love and a modicum of independence from her overbearing parents in Corfu in the ‘80s. Different places, different eras. But what binds the two girls in a common fate? And who is the lady of the pier?As with Ms Moschoudi’s previous book, I found myself immersed and mesmerized. The writer has an undisputed talent for creating vivid imagery through her amazing descriptive skills that managed to stay with me long after I’d put the book down. No, this was not one of the books that I speedread, needing to devour the story. Here, I needed to savor. I found myself rereading parts just to refuel a scene’s energy to keep it running in my mind longer, and I got withdrawal symptoms when I finally ended it.It’s not just the two enticing stories, the breathtaking beauty of the landscape, the authenticity of the characters or the heart-warming dialogue; it’s what reigns over these. An inner glow, an inherent purity that emanates from the pages to create a sense of completeness, like a dream you don’t want to wake up from.I'm so glad I'll get to live the dream again in the book’s sequel, The Lady of the Pier—The Flow!Highly recommended!

The Ketogenic Diet for Weight Loss is a life changing book for those wanting to lose weight! It has great information on Ketogenic Diets, including the basics, what to eat, and how to use it to maximize your weight loss! This book for me was life changing! I have learnt so much and have been trying to eat a Ketogenic diet every since, and have found i feel better and have more energy and i'm starting to lose weight! Must read for anyone wanting to shift a few kgs!
summary: Great Guide to the Ketogenic Diet!

reviewText: I learned a great deal reading this book. It is well written and has a specific focus to it and I really liked that. From the introduction on, I found myself quickly absorbing new information on herbs and spices. For example, they do a lot more than just add flavor to food. Ginger and turmeric are two spices discussed, but there are many more. It's a fairly short book, but jam packed with useful information. There are even some good recipes. Overall, I was pleasantly informed and glad I bought the book.
summary: Add Some Herbs and Spices to Your Diet

reviewText: I don’t any more convincing when it comes to eating healthy. I am particularly keen to splurge in herbs and spices when it comes to cooking and meal preparation. I must say there are a few spices and herbs I haven’t heard of such as Burdock Root and Chaparral. Reading about their benefits make me wonder what took me so long to learn about them. It’s good to know about the benefits of the herbs and spices to the body but it would help much if readers are informed how these spices are best prepared to achieve the maximum benefits. The recipes are amazing! Good grab!
summary: Going back to basics with herbs and spices

reviewText: Natural Health benefits of herbs and spices is very smart option to use nowadays. It is very natural to heal yourself and to have a great lifestyle and diet in your everyday living. It is great that Kathleen Rao gives us extremely informative books that will surely helps us to have a healthy way to live. This book is very well written and full of information. Great job!

This is such a very knowledgeable book wherein you'll be able to learn the different benefits and uses of natural herbs and spices. Why not to go with this? It's hassle free and easier. Thanks to this book. Now I know how to take good care of my being with the help of those natural medications!
summary: The Natural Health Benefits of Herbs and Spices: What Herbs and Spices Can Do for Your Health, and How to Work Herbs and Spices

reviewText: I love this book! Learned a lot of new benefits from this book.The book is very clear and easy to read.

This book presents you with practical and actionable tips and all you have to do is use them. Now being you are most likely a procrastinator it will be easy for you to read this and then think about it until you take zero action. So challenge yourself to read one action chapter, put the book down and take action on that step. Then once you have mastered that go onto the next one. Great tips and strategies !

Another highly entertaining Wendy Darlin book. Wendy regrets letting Roger plan their wedding, but it comes off without that many hitches. As with the other Wendy books, it is cleverly written, lots of laughs, a great cast of characters, old and new, a plot that moves at a fast pace, and twists that keep one turning the pages. As always, a fun read.

This book includes tips and ideas that small and large companies can use to enhance their social presence,as well as individuals. The Author's writing style is easygoing and it is easy to read. Straight to the point. It is really a blueprint you can use and you do not have to use all the strategies all at once,  you can implement them  over time. It is a book I will continually go back to for more and more strategies to increase my online business....Recommend!

Not my cup of tea. This was my first story about succubus and although I had a light idea of what they did (suck life/energy from other beings in order to survive) the premise of this book intrigued me enough to want to read it.Pia is our succubus that feels she's left her family down one too many times and feels she just cannot face them. I actually liked the girl. She seemed a real enough girl with enough flaws to make her a believable character. I liked her world, I liked her supportive family. I even liked the few secondary characters that happened to show up to fill up the story. I just didn't like the creature that was Pia. She was supposed to orgasm every 3 days in order to survive. And she had to do it with a different partner ... That's just ...No...I know I'm going to get drilled because obviously the blurb said everything I needed to know about the book before I picked it up but I guess I was just hoping for a more imaginative way of portraying the situation. There was just not enough roughness to be an erotica and no romance whatsoever to make it a PNR. Now this is just a prequel but Pia's  "conundrum" didn't do anything for me and I just don't feel like picking up the rest of the series. Maybe others will enjoy this book and will find it fascinating but I can only give it 3 stars, and only because I really, really liked Pia.*I RECEIVED THIS BOOK IN EXCHANGE FOR AN HONEST REVIEW*
summary: It's in the name , but not enough

reviewText: Pick Me is Book 3 in Magnolia Bay. It is written by Erika Marks. It his Thea & Calder's story.Thea has been dumped by the man she had planned to marry. The man she dated for 3 years. She is a no-nonsense lawyer. She has returned home to Magnolia Bay to reconcile her feelings, mend her broken heart, and rid her home of termites. She has a two week vacation so she rents a house in her hometown. She learns that her new neighbor is none other than Calder Frye, the bad boy high school crush who makes her heart still race. Thea had sworn men off, but Calder may have her breaking her own rule.It's been 14 years since graduation and Calder has become an ER doctor. He traded in his bad-boy lifestyle but his appeal is still powerful on Thea. She doesn't know if she should live out her fantasy that she has carried since she was a teen or if what she feels could be something more than she thought. Family drama and other things are making it hard to make any progress in their romance.

Another awesome book.  New York cop meets his hound mate and the shenanigans begin. The story, despite introducing new characters and couples each book, is expanding and evolving. (Ariel is totally my favorite). I find myself sighing with disappointment at the end of each book because I don't want to say goodbye to the characters who I feel I know.

After reading thees books coconut oil has now become an absolute must have in my daily diet.Author explains all the benefits you're going to gain if you'll start using coconut oil on a daily basis.And the other book got me more curious about other oils' as well.If you're trying to understand if or why you should use coconut oil and other powerful remedies in your daily diet, then read this book!

Nowadays, people are continuously getting smarter and work life gets more and more competitive. I liked how this book gave me some ideas on how to be a more effective employee through communication, verbal and non-verbal. I know that I’m assertive at work, but I appreciate the additional help and realizations that I got from this book. I learned that it’s always very important to voice out sensible opinions or questions because these will give me a strong backbone; hence, making me more successful and fulfilled at work.
summary: Be More Efficient by being Assertive!

reviewText: This was my first read by this author and I'm really digging her. Although I didn't read the book before this one, it was pretty easy to follow. So many twists and turns with plenty of real life drama. I appreciated the fact that this story was so realistic. I will be checking out more of Ms. Jackson's work.
This book reminds me of Stephen King type of horror, it builds steadily and is creepy. Loved the strong female protagonists and the twists took me by surprise. A highly enjoyable read.

reviewerName: Paula of Harps Romance Book Review
reviewText: I loved this book and read it in one setting, couldn't put in down.  I loved Thomas's story. The characters are so human and believeable.  I can't wait to find out what happens with Thomas, Lila, and Lexie.  Inglath Copper's Nashville series is all 5 star reads!!! Kudos to a great author. http://harpsromancebookreview.com
summary: Loved this book, Read in one setting!!

reviewText: May contain some spoilersIf you are looking for mystery, murder, suspense, humor, and a lot of romance with spice look not further. I enjoyed A COLLECTOR'S ITEM: ROWENA'S AFTER DARK REGENCY ROMANCE. I really liked the heroine, Rowena. She was sweet, innocent but spunky at the same time. All that she wanted was to solve a 12 year old murder mystery to possibly clear her brother, Malcolm and her husband, Alaric. Alaric, The Earl of Brayleigh, had the devil may care attitude about life. He went around collecting beautiful things, like art work. Alaric and Malcolm were adversaries from way back. Malcolm fled England to the continent when it was thought he killed Ingram. Alaric was under suspicion for the murder but deflected it to Malcolm.  Both Malcolm and Alaric were at the scene of the crime 12 years ago.I loved the by-play between Rowena and Alaric. You could tell that both the H/h were in love early on. Then throw Malcolm and Alaric's ex-mistress into the mix  and voila, the fun begins! The banter between all of the characters was so much fun to read. The sex scenes were hot.I just can't wait for Alicia to release her next book! She has become and auto buy for me.
summary: Regency romance with humor, a murder mystery to solve and one hot romance

reviewText: This is a well-organized, well-written book, with a ton of recipes that can amp up your metabolism and help you lose weight, an activity I'm always interested in.  Wide variety of food and flavors.  Highly recommend.
Millions of us around this world want to lose weight but hate counting those @#@#%$% calories. This book is the answer. I've looked at all the recipes and can't wait to make them.

This book does exactly what the title says it will. I have followed the plan in this book and have already seen the weight loss. Easy to do to. I am extremely happy with this purchase and would recommend this a book to anyone who is looking  to lose weight the right way.

This may seem like an impossible feat to lose 14 obs in 4 weeks.  Mark Powell has some very interesting insights as to how you can accomplish this 4 week plan. Be clear that you know will power and determination will get you to your ultimate goal. This is an easy manner in which to lose weight and maintain it.  Lyn Marie

reviewText: Every one in my circle calls me "nice". And I'd enjoy that label, except for the fact that it causes me major stress in my life. I'd just be too eager to say "Yes" to anything and please people. That's when I realized I needed to start taking charge of my life. That's why I'm glad I picked up this book because it showed me a clear distinction of how being assertive is not being aggressive or mean. I can still be kind, but have a stay true to my beliefs and calmly express them to others. I highly recommend this book for people looking for the answers to truly being assertive and having real integrity.

I was looking for a book on assertiveness because I'm either passive-aggressive or straight on aggressive. Never in between.This book helped me a lot in terms of guidance and techniques. A highly recommended self-help book
Has a mix of things going for it. Style if writing keeps you wanting to turn the page. Subject  matter is a bit of a mix from old to future themes. Melded into on  Great book

Awesomeeee! Love the free gift that was included too, real value add which is great.As far as the book goes, it was a stand out book to me.The recipes are simple, delicious, well laid out and easy to follow. I particularly enjoyed that there was a bunch of written, non-recipe content too that really laid out benefits of green drinks.So far I've only tried 3 of the recipes: the tropical collard, the blakcberry shard smoothie and the kiwi sunflower. They were very tasty and energizing, once I've tried more of the recipes I'm going to come back and increase to a 5 star.Highly recommend
summary: Great book on green juice n smoothies!

reviewText: I do have such interest in learning new languages. In my opinion, I think that it’s a way for me to blend in with another country’s culture, and also, it keeps my brain active. The book was kind enough to give some points to consider when learning a new language, not only in Portuguese. It wasn’t too difficult for me as I studied this because I took up Spanish (which has similarities to the Portuguese language) back when I was in college. I found this book to be very helpful because of the translating exercises (with given answers afterwards) after each topic; hence, supplementing the texts and giving me more practice.

You will find lots of information about Essential Oils in this guide. What was a surprise to me is, that you can use Essential Oils not only on your skin and for aromatherapy, but also to prepare refreshing drinks - you will find wonderful recipes on this book.All in all you get lots of benefits from this guide and I will recommend this book to anyone who will listen.

I was so excited to see Paul and Friday get together! It was a good story. I really did like it. But,that being said, it wasn't my favorite for sure. It seemed like it skimmed over some details that could have made this book better. Also I'm not sure if it's because I bought my book the first day it was out, but mine had a lot of highlighted words throughout the book. I still love Tammy Falkner and I can't wait to read about Sam!!
summary: The oldest Reed brother gets his turn!

reviewText: Instead of repeating themes which tend to happen in a series, this tale is different. This story is heart wrenching and fulfilling all at the same time. No spoilers here but I fell in love with Reed brothers a little more.

reviewerName: Sian "You want a hero, buy a comic book"
reviewText: Avid fan here I own every book by this author and just when I pick a favorite pair she introduces another! There is humor, action, mystery, and such hot men! Another win, and as always can't wait for more!

reviewText: Nobody likes acne. I know it has been one of my worst experiences of my youth. You feel like you're cursed and you can't do nothing about it. However, this is not true at all. There are scientifically proven ways to cure acne and do something about this illness.The reason most people feel cursed is because they've tried things that don't work and so they're frustrated. Learning about an illness is the best way to feel confident about overcoming it. No book can help you cure acne instantly, but this one is a great start - no matter who's struggling with it, you, your kids, partner or friend.

Great story line and plot development overall. The author provides a fresh perspective on interracial relationships interspersed with daily struggles such a union would birth. I would have loved to see more interaction about Keir’s issues as opposed to the few moments of reminiscing and panic attacks he had. I loved the slow build up as opposed to the explosive scenarios that sometimes taint good romance novels leaving nothing to the imagination. However there seemed to be a disconnect in how one scene was integrated into the next; poor punctuation, incorrect use of nouns (regime vs. regimen) and random stoppage of thoughts hindered the storyline flow. Also, the last couple of plots, between Myah confronting her ex and Keir saving the day, was rushed and sort of blindsided me. All in all I gave the book 5 stars because it was refreshing and extolled values that I hold in esteem. I would definitely read from this author again.
summary: Slow but intense and sweet build up

reviewText: I really enjoyed this book. They were Christian, but they weren't pious. They were real. They were tempted. They made mistakes. The way the story was written made you feel like you could connect. There wasn't the overly dramatic and ridiculous main female.  There wasn't the jerk of all jerks leading male.Worth the money.

The story was absolutely wonderful. Stone and Killain's relationship was so sweet. My favorite part in the whole story was the cave scene its like watching a movie and you shout when the hero saves the day and for me that person is Wayne this doesn't take away from Stone and Killian but I just love Wayne to me that's one bad man. Nikolia was hilarious I couldn't stop laughing at him. Killian I love him to because he tough and can shift into different things. Thanks again Sandrine for a wonderful story.

It can be easy to begin obsessing when it comes to losing weight. This book is a good reminder to step back and ensure you have the right approach. Weight loss takes time and the idea is not how quickly you do it, but that you accomplish your goal in the end.

This book is interesting. I always want to read book that contain healthy lifestyle and some technique to have a better life. This book is a good reminder to step back and ensure you have the right approach. It is very helpful to covers a wide range of solutions to lose up weigh and give us tips and techniques to achieve your goals. I highly recommend this book to everyone. Great job!

This was an amazing read by Beth Michele. I was hooked from the first chapter and could not put this down until the end. The chemistry between Rex and Vanessa was amazing. They both had issues from their pasts that threatened to ruin what they knew in their hearts they had found with the other. This book will grab you pull you in and not let you go until the very last page. This is a must read for all.

This is the first book on aura balancing that I have read and found it really interesting. I am excited to continue learning about chakras and apply what I am learning. I really resonated with this statement from the book:You need to try your best to be in full control of your emotions, but you also need to be able to accurately and effectively express those emotions towards other people.

Great book! The writing was great, and kept the reader entertained and on the edge of their seat the entire time. It is definitel one of those books that you start reading, and can't put down! I loved the characters, and think that the author did an excellent job of describing everyone and everything. It definitely brings the reader right into the action with the characters, and you are able to picture everything clearly. I am definitely looking forward to the next book in the series, I'm sure it will be as good as this one!I give this novel a five out of five stars!

The writing is fabulous and the story is engrossing. Great book...now, where's the next book!! :D

The thought of planting and growing my own produce seems fun and easy. I’m excited to attempt growing fruit in my house because I love conducting experiments. Given the fact that climate and sunlight play vital factors in the success of planting anything, I feel up to the challenge. Grow Fruit Indoors for Beginners covers the foundation and basics are covered to start planting 3 different kinds of fruits. This book is a great introduction to indoor fruit planting and encourages the eco-friendly possibility of growing your own food which is a positively sustainable way of life.

Real Weight Loss Stories: How I Lost 60 Lbs. in 6 months On My Own Terms & With No Special Diet Plan, is a great ebook about a girls struggles with bulimia through her life from childhood, marriage, children,and family tragedy. The weight gain and loss trials and tribulations of this woman, and how she conquered her demons.  I really liked her story, and how even though she had her highs and lows, she never gave up and keep pushing to give herself the right motivation to make herself happy. This is a lifelong battle that will never end for her. I am proud she has come so far.Great read!

reviewText: Laura Handfield has written an open and honest book. She details her struggles with her weight. She was the only overweight person in her family, and was constantly compared to her thinner sister. This resulted in Laurel developing an eating disorder. Her story takes you through her battle with food addiction and her discovery of bulimia as a means to try to control her weight. Her journey continues to having a healthy relationship with food and exercise, and a thinner, healthier body. I highly recommend this book not only to anyone with a weight issue, but also to anyone with body-image issues. I think that teenagers and young adults in particular would benefit from this book.

Weight Loss Stories is a good read. The author journalizes her life with her weight issues over the course of many years. She chronicles her school years with her food addiction, and later on, alcohol addiction. This helped to pile the weight on. She thinks she discovers a new diet plan by eating and purging. She does this for several years. As she matures, she realizes what works and doesn’t work for her in losing weight. Exercise is encouraged by this author.  She had tried diet after fad diet but nothing seemed to work and the weight came back and brought more. She stuck with it and was able to lose nearly 100 pounds. Good for her!

I gave up on this book a little more than half-way through.  The writing is stilted at times.  Occasionally the author writes scenes that could develop into something interesting, emotional and perhaps educational but nothing develops.Plug and play characters, choppy dialogue and believable plot.I doubt I will finish this book.  I may be interested in other works by this author.Remember, this is my personal opinion and it does not reflect on the author.
summary: Charlotte's Mail Order Husband (New Montana Bride series Book 4)

I only got through 60% of it before I stopped.  The characters relationship progressed rather quickly, in my opinion.  I'm not sure I'd want to read another one of her books.
First few recipes are good, looking at the the ingredients of the recipes they are proven to maintain low cholesterol so I'm looking forward to reading more of the recipes in this book

summary: A sugarcreek Amish romance-three years later

reviewText: I knew what the subject matter was before I began reading, but I was not prepared for the "thrill ride" that this book became. I am never afraid to feel when I am watching a movie or reading a book as some are. I did not find the book depressing. I found it to be exhilarating.Each chapter led me further and further into the devious plan of the main character. I never could predict what was going to happen next. I was very saddened by his ongoing deterioration as the novel progressed. Also, I was never really sure whether what was happening was reality or delusion. This was very entertaining.There was NOTHING predictable about this book. I had no idea how it was going to end and I loved that. As long as you are aware about what you are getting into I know you will enjoy this book.Mr. Khan has a wonderful grasp of character development, plot, and dialog. He uses short, spare strokes (as well as some long, full ones) to paint his novel in brilliant colors.This book has my highest recommendation. It is sensational.--Note: I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

Let Love Live is the fifth book in Melissa Collins’ Love series and it seriously is the best one. The book is broke into 3 parts. Part 1 fills in so many blanks from the other books. And it is also one of the saddest things I’ve read in a long time. Part 2 and part 3 bring on so much happiness. And the epilogue is PERFECT!Part 1 is the story of Dylan and Shane. You learned a lot about Shane in the previous books but this is his story from his point of view. It’s about Shane and Dylan’s love story. And learning who they were. Even though it is incredibly sad, it is a truly loving story. I really want to tell you more, but it will ruin the series. Truly ruin it. If you’ve read the series, I will tell you that questions will be answered. You will learn all about Shane and his feelings. It fills in so many blanks.Part 2 is Dylan and Collin’s love story. It’s about Dylan healing and finding peace and the ability to move on. It’s about 2 men who have had an incredible rough life, coming together and healing together. And learning to love again. Yes, they have their ups and downs. But deep down, it was love at first sight. They might not admit that but reading their story, you can feel their connection from their first meeting. It was pure and immediate. It was natural. And it is beautiful.Part 3 is their forever. Their declaration of love. Their future.And the epilogue. THE EPILOGUE! It brings it all together. And it is the perfect end to their book.But, BUT! I can’t wait to read more of this series. It is a great series. And this book makes it so much better. This book is perfect. I don’t have a single complaint about it. Except, maybe that I want more.~Katie
summary: Let Love Live is the fifth book in Melissa Collins’ Love ...

reviewText: It was laugh out loud funny at some parts and really sweet in others. I loved the story and I especially liked the ghost!!!

"Giving in to love was the best mistake I ever made."I felt like I was walking on pins and needles waiting for this book to come out. Giving In was such an amazing book and it gave me so many feels! Plus, it left you with such a heart stopping cliffhanger! Is Harlow ok? Will Cruz ever get to tell her how he truly feels?"I once said to her that if she just wanted to be friends then I would have to live with that, but I wouldn't live without her in my life."In this continuing story, we find Cruz watching the love of his life fighting to come back to him. After the accident, Harlow was left in a coma. Finally, after many weeks, Harlow wakes up but she's not the same. She has lost some of her memory and in that memory was her love for Cruz. *enter tears* She doesn't remember the past year and their love for each other. By 8% into this book, I was in tears. Like serious tears! Cruz broke my heart! Ok, more like shattered it into a million pieces. His love for Harlow was so strong and she couldn't give the same to him. Would she ever remember their love?"When you have something like what Harlow and I had, you don't just give up. You don't give up on love."Seeing how hard Cruz tries to get her back is seriously the most emotional and sweetest thing. His fight to save their love is just...wow! I wanted to reach through my kindle and hold him!"Because I love you, Turnip, and that't never going to change as long as I stand here and breathe the same air you do."This book makes you think of what you would do in the same situation. Would you fight? Would you run? Could you stand to see the person you love looking back at you and they don't feel the same way? Ahhhhh!! This book is amazing! MR Joseph knows how to suck you into a story and make you feel so many emotions."I takes a couple of seconds to say hello, but forever to say goodbye."My love for Cruz was shot through the roof with this book! Every woman should be so lucky to have a man like him in their life. Believe me, if you liked him before, you will loooooove him now<3 Plus, you get to see how Harlow's recovery effects not just Cruz, but everyone around them. It's an adjustment for everybody.I highly recommend this book and series to everyone. Get ready for the feels and grab some tissues!"With you is where I belong. I'm in, baby. Always."
summary: How hard would you fight to get the love of your life back?

reviewText: Every breast feeding mother and soon to be mothers need to acquire the valuable information contained in this book. You will learn what you are supposed to do soon after delivering, the various positions to adapt, and what to eat to make breastfeeding a smooth and enjoyable activity. The unique thing about this book is that you even get to learn what to do when you overproduce breast milk, which is not explained in most breastfeeding books.

******4.5************I received a copy of this book in exchange for an honest review ***The best things in life are worth the greatest risk. Sometimes, before we fall, we fly.Until we Fly is book four in the Beautifully Broken series by Courtney Cole and Brand Killien’ story, and the one I have been waiting for since meeting this hunk of a man the second book in the series If You Leave, and then again in Before We Fall.In my both my reviews I had to give him a special mention, and said he need his own story. I like to think that after reading my reviews, Courtney said! “Okay Derna just for you I will write Brand’ s story. LOL! Brand was one of those secondary characters that left their mark on me, there was just something about him, he really was a good friend, a good soldier, a good everything, and he was so worthy of his own book as I wanted to know more about him and his story.In Until We Fly we learn Brand’s backstory, what makes him the way he is. We discover his pain, his secrets and demons from a harrowing childhood that he wants to forget that he has learnt to deal with, but they still that haunts him. I just love this man even more now so sexy, so loyal, so protected a true hero, and just a nice guy with the biggest heart.Nora Greene is the girl from his past, who has always had a thing for on Brand. I didn’t know what to make of her at first, but as her story unfolded, and I discover her pain and her secrets, I understood her more, she may come across as confidence you could see she had her insecurities, there was a vulnerability about her. I love her brazen attitude she knew what she wanted, and she wanted Brand. Something you have to take the bull by the horn, and just go for what you want, and Nora didBrand and Nora are two people who have issues, who have parents who were never going to win parents of the year award, who have demons to deal with, but work well together, have a connection, have great chemistry, and soon realize that they need each other in order to heal and move forward.Once again in true Courtney style she as has written a book that comes from the heart. I love how she always manages to take me on an emotional roller coaster. I loved drama, pain, angst, and the twist and turns that I never saw coming that Brand and Nora go through, but also the steam, love, hope, passion forgiveness and romance that they share. I was hooked right till the end, and I love the sweet epilogue.If you love books that pull at your heartstrings then this one, and the rest of the Beautiful Broken series is for you. Courtney Cole will not disappoint you.Favorite Quotes.Fluctuat Nec Mergitur ~ “tossed by the waves, she does not sink”"I've been through the bloody hills of Afghanistan, but there's nothing scarier than opening yourself up to someone else, only to get shattered."“Each day, I try not to trust the feeling that are growing, the attachment, the tenderness, the bond. Each I realize I’m failing”“We’re like two prize fighter, circling around a ring, each waiting for the other one to pounce. We’ve both got secrets that we don’t want the other to know”“Being brave doesn't mean not being afraid, Nora. It means being afraid and doing it anyway."“He made me feel safe in a world that is dangerous and ugly, a world that has only hurt me.”"You stand on a wall to protect what is yours”“I need to see him it’s a need that I can't explain, a feeling that hearkens back to my youth-and hasn’t faded over time”“Brand can take away the ugliness and make me feel good again, even if it's only an illusion...a temporary illusion”
summary: ***4.5 Stars***  I was waiting for this one... Love it, and Love Brand.

reviewText: Like any of Courtney Cole's books we first had Pax which I loved, then Gabe, and Dominic. All three of these men were broken but love will definitely come for our next love interest Brand. Courtney definitely has a way with writing her books because they all make me want to re-read them. I have always loved New Adult and this series definitely is great to begin with! Brand is HOT and it was great to see the chemistry between Brand and Nora.Brand has been a part of every story line, he is Gabe's best friend from the Army Rangers. He was wounded like Gabe. He is the guy when someone is in trouble or afraid. Brand fixes everyone's problems except his own pain after the Army and childhood. Until Nora comes in and he questions whether he is worthy of her love. While they may be damaged, fate has brought them together to help each other overcome their pasts and learn the truths.  Each of their characters are flawed but Cole is great at this because she can some how put them together with her beautiful writing.I am already a big fan of Courtney Cole and it hasn't changed since I always buy her books! The Beautifully Broken Series could be dark and twisted, then in the next it becomes beautiful. I also love seeing updates on past characters which is another thing I love.  Until We Fly will craete butterflies in your stomach, maybe even tears because these strong characters go through so much! Can't wait for more books to come!!

I am only into my third book of the box set and I love it!!!  I love my alpha males and so far I am not disappointed.  Starting with Sienna Mynx book Rallenti...whew lord Renaldo, is one intense, hot, pure 100% bonafide sexy ass alpha man walking! I loved the story and I loved the chemistry between Kyra and Renaldo as well as the HOT love scenes.  If you are not familiar with the Battaglia series, get familiar with it!  If you loved this book by Ms. Mynx, purchase the entire Battaglia series! If you want more of tall, good looking alpha men, sink your teeth into Giovanni, Lorenzo and Carlo of the Battagila series. You wont be disappointed!!! As always Ms. Mynx outstanding!!!!Now, let me talk about my Navy Seals that Aliyah Burke writes about.  If your not familiar with the Megalodon series, get familiar with it.  You will not be disappointed. (Tyson and his hazel eyes is my favorite Seal) Although Reeve is not a Seal, he is an alpha man that can handle himself.  Affrika is independent, talented and very attracted to Reeves, the brother of one of the Seals.  Reeve is rich, spoiled and determined to have Affrika.  The chemistry between the two is intense while the story is intriguing and draws you into some of the realities that actual happen around the world.  Love, betrayal, family and trust makes this book a definite winner!!I just finished reading Pepper Pace's book, Everything is Everything and let me tell you, it is excellent!! The story is well written and told in so much depth and detail that it brought back so many memories that I had growing up when I to had once lived up a hill a few streets away from the projects.  This story draws you into the lives of the each person.  What they faced growing up in the area that they did, how they handled it and how they survived it.  I am looking forward the the next installment of this book where lies are revealed, truth is discovered and relationships are more than likely broken beyond repair.  Well done Ms. Pace!!!Tiana Laveen's Tattooed Moon is yet another well written phenomenal book by this author.  Julien and Milan are somewhat like kindred spirits who are drawn to each other by their similar hurts as well as their vast differences.  Julien isn't the normal alpha male that you would expect, but, he is just that as well as having many other attributes that make you look at him much deeper than what is tattooed on his outside skin. Milan saw that, a lot of people normally would not.  The story between the two is an awe inspiring love story that will make you think, truly think about how you perceive people on the outside.  Not everyone that is smiling on the outside is not crying internally.  Milan and Julien are each other's medicine, which cured them both of what they have lost and what they were missing.  Well done Ms. Laveen!!Latrivia Nelson's Vasily's Revenge has me definitely wanting more.  Although this is not the first book that I have read from this author, this was the first book in the Medlov series that I have read and now, I need to go back to the beginning starting with Dimitry!! I am hooked!! Vasily love's Lily, he wants to protect her but doesn't know if he can trust her.  Lies, deceit and unanswered questions swirl around Vasily, Lily, Dylan and other's.  I will be looking for the sequel in November!  I can't wait to delve further into the Medlov series!!Erosa Knowles and the twins Donnie and Blaine lord yes I will take both of them please!!!  I love this series and I am soooo  glad that I did not have to start at the beginning to find out about the twins personalities.  Yes, very dominant, very alpha and very fine men who take control of Belinda who cannot and will not separate the two of them.  I enjoyed this read immensely and I am glad that it intertwined with the character's so well.  The chemistry between Donald, Blaine and Belinda was definitely on fire along with the love that they each have for each other and their twin boys.  If you have not read the Men of 3X Construction series, get it and read about these alpha men who definitely make their presence known! Well done Ms. Knowels.Bridget Midway's book was definitely worth the read.  I read this book a while back and enjoyed it.  I definitely enjoyed the updated version of the book even better.  The Dom in Keys(Tank) was shown a lot which I thoroughly enjoyed!  Eminance was still a little annoying to me by jumping to conclusions before finding out the true answers but, so had Keys jumped to conclusions as well.  I was glad that this version had Eminance taking the leap of faith and fulfilling her career as well as her desire to have Keys in her life.  The author delved into personal issues which held each person back for one reason or another. But although time may not heal all wounds, talking and listening completely will help.  Well done Ms. Midway!!Serenity King's Michael's Wrath had me wanting to knock on his door!!!  I love the Alesi series and these strong Alpha men!!!  Michael is no joke!  He knows what he wants regardless of who may have an objection to it and conquers it.  The attraction is immediate with Michael and Kendra and yes the love scenes are HOT!!!  But, there definitely is mystery surrounding Kendra, I'm not sure of what it is but I can't wait to find out! Ms. King, don't make us wait to long!! Well done.Sieged by Rym was really good.  Rym and Krysteena's chemistry was in tune with what one would have with their mate, complete.  It was interesting to read about to Alpha's one being a female. Both have dominant personalities, both are warriors and neither wanted to back down.  The book was an enjoyable read which I am sure that I will be reading again.  Good Job Ms. Hines.
summary: I"M LOVING THIS!!! IM IN READING HEAVEN!!

reviewText: I haven't read the entire collection but i skipped to Pepper Pace and i have to say i am loving it so far. i am also looking forward to all the other stories cause am new to these authors and i know they would be great.

I was gifted this box set from one of the authors......and I have in return gifted it to 12 other friends....I read non-stop and was not disapointed. The stories are captivating, intriguing, hot and steamy......just what I expected from this amazing group of writersI will not give away any plots because I feel you must experience these phenomenal writers and stories for yourself.... but what an amazing collaboration of work has been produced from authors who are "second to none".....Don't miss out on this box set....IT IS WELL WORTH THE PRICE...Yvette Hines, Sienna Mynx, Aliyah Burke, Serenity King, Erosa Knowles, Tiana Laveen, Bridget Midway, Latrivia Nelson and Pepper Pace.....BRAVO, BRAVO........

I only readthe first two stories in this serires.  I  really enjoyed reading the firs two stories.  I cannot wait to complete the other seven stories.  Please purchased this book. You will not be disappointed.

The stories just pull you in from the very beginning.  It's a steal at $0.99 for all of these wonderful authors and quality writing to boot.  So what are you waiting for?  You should have one clicked by now.
I loved this so much. So many stories. I feel like the book is worth so much more then 99 cents. I'm looking forward to more. Totally recommend it.

I have a good few on Toms books now as we have a vegetable patch out our back and I love the way he writes. Very informative and easy to follow. I love the way he explain the benefits, the history and the disadvantages. The planning section with diagrams are extremely helpful! There is a step by step guide and tips on what to grow. although this story started off  slow, it picked up and had my brain in overdrive. I love how this story ties into the original Misfit Creed. Code is vicious and if she comes into her own, watch out. I love these two authors! This was a little different than what I was expecting but in a great way.The action flowed steadily and the characters are so vividly lifelike. I felt like I was at the movies with this book. And then the end came. Or was it the end?  Brick Storm keep up the great work, I can't wait for the next book!

This book was refreshing! It was an out of the ordinary read in the romance realm and I totally enjoyed it. I loved Ashley and Ethan both, although they were both equally frustrating and annoying at times. But reading their conversations and following their actions, I have no doubt that this would be the reality in anyone in this situation.Ashley is the good child in the family, trying to stay out of trouble after her brother Mark and his best friend Ethan are arrested. She's known Ethan her whole life because of her brother and he's always felt like family until the boys were arrested. Some circumstances come together at a gas station and Ashley and Ethan find themselves on the run and in fear for their lives. Their banter in the beginning is funny, as they are constantly sniping at each other. The crazy road trip to Sioux Falls, South Dakota, that should have taken a little under 24 hours, due to some horrible luck and unforseen circumstances, ends up being an ordeal, and over a week of travel, which puts them both to the test. As they spend more and more time together however things begin to change between them.There are some nail biting scenes and you cant wait to see what will happen and how this will all end.I would definitely recommend this book and really enjoyed it!!

Organic gardening is easy to do when it is in your backyard as you can control what gets put on your plants. This is an easy to read and follow along with guide to square foot gardening. It isn't hard to do but does take a bit of set up to get things going. Stick with it and you will be good to go.

Unchain My Heart (Scorpio Stinger MC #2) by Jani KayA Hot and Beautiful Love Story Between A Biker and A PrincessJani Kay is an amazing author and she has done it again! I am a huge Jani Kay Fan. Unchain My Heart is the second book of the Scorpio StingerMC series and with each book this series gets better and better. This is an amazing book that will have you experiencing a rollercoaster ofemotions. Jani will have you falling in love with the story and the characters from the beginning. There are many twists and turns that will haveyou routing for the forbidden love of Ryder and Jade and hoping for a HEA for everyone.Ryder is a hot and sexy biker that is loyal to his family and friends. Jade is a princess from a wealthy family that is way out of his league.Almost everyone seems to be trying to tear them apart especially Jacob “Cobra” Malone (President of the Scorpio MC) and Harrison Summers(Jade’s brother). The loyalty and love Ryder and Jade have for each other help them realize that they cannot live without each other. This moreimportant to Ryder and Jade than what their friends and families think about their relationship. They will do what is necessary to stay together.Is their love enough to conquer the obstacles they have to face?Cobra believes Jade is going to be the downfall of the Scorpio MC and wants Ryder to walk away from her or leave the club, but can Ryder walkaway from Jade or will he walk away from MC family?Harrison hates bikers especially Ryder Knox since the horrific accident that took away his finance Amy from him and has left him bitter andcold. He believes that the bad boy biker Ryder is not good enough for his sister and will ruin her future. Will Jade have the courage to show herbrother that is wrong about Ryder or will she walk away from Ryder?One night Eva Ryder (Ryder’s Half-sister) walks into Harrison’s life and catches his attention immediately. He discovers that his has feelings forEva that his not felt since Amy. Will Eva be the woman that will unchain Harrison’s cold heart and make him believe in love again? Can Harrisonstart over and become the loving, kind, and warm hearted man that he once was in his life or is he to damaged and controlling to love again?In the meanwhile the war between Harrison and the Scorpio MC becomes more intense and there is a child abducted from the MC compound,but who is responsible for the abduction is it the arch enemy the L.A. Demon, is it someone from Scorpio MC, or is it someone from the past?There is a dark secret from the past that is discovered that puts everyone on edge and suspicious. Will this dark secret destroy friendships,family bonds, and turn everyone against each other or will this dark secret bring everyone closer together?If you are a reader that believes that true love even if it is forbidden or damaged can survive any obstacle and flourish then you will definitelyenjoy this amazing book. This a modern day Romeo and Juliet story.
summary: A Hot and Beautiful Love Story Between A Biker and A Princess

reviewText: From the first page to the very last Jani has you sitting at the edge of your seat wanting to know more! The characters in this book are just amazing even the ones everyone hates, because you will secretly love them too! I give this book 4 stars!-Harper
